hu.akarnokd.reactive4java.reactive

Class RunOnce

  • java.lang.Object
    • hu.akarnokd.reactive4java.reactive.RunOnce

  • public final class RunOnce
extends Object
    Helper class which ensures that only a single action is invoked. It can be used in cases when multiple observers want to do the same thing (e.g., fire an error() or finish()) but only one of them should ever succeed
    Author:
    akarnokd, 2011.01.31.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      RunOnce() 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean invoke(Action0 action)
      Invoke the given action only if this RunOnce has not invoked anything before.

      Invoke the given action only if this RunOnce has not invoked anything before.

    • Constructor Detail

      • RunOnce

        public RunOnce()

    • Method Detail

      • invoke

        public boolean invoke(Action0 action)
        Invoke the given action only if this RunOnce has not invoked anything before. The method ensures that if this RunOnce is invoked from multiple threads or multiple cases, only the very first one executes its submitted action.
        Parameters:
        action - the action to invoke
        Returns:
        returns true if the action was invoked

      • invoke

        public <T> boolean invoke(Action1<? super T> action,
                 T parameter)
        Invoke the given action only if this RunOnce has not invoked anything before. The method ensures that if this RunOnce is invoked from multiple threads or multiple cases, only the very first one executes its submitted action.
        Type Parameters:
        T - the parameter type
        Parameters:
        action - the action to invoke
        parameter - the parameter to use when invoking the action.
        Returns:
        true if the action was invoked
